pv.title: Party View
pv.desc: Enjoy random albums fullscreen, perfect for background use

queue.help: Use the right click on a track and select 'Add to queue'

FATAL_ERROR.title: Fatal error
FATAL_ERROR.message: Something went very wrong in ManaZeak initialization. Please contact support.

UNKNOWN_ERROR.title: Unknown error
UNKNOWN_ERROR.message: Something unexpected happened and isn't properly handled in source code.

ACCESS_FORBIDDEN.title: Access forbidden
ACCESS_FORBIDDEN.message: You are not granted to access the API url you tried to reach.

URL_NOT_FOUND.title: URL not found
URL_NOT_FOUND.message: The API url you tried to reach doesn't exists.

INTERNAL_ERROR.title: Internal server error
INTERNAL_ERROR.message: Something went wrong back side of the moon.

MEDIA_SRC_NOT_SUPPORTED_ERROR.title: Track not found
MEDIA_SRC_NOT_SUPPORTED_ERROR.message: The media could not be loaded because the source path doesn't exists on the server.

MEDIA_DECODE_ERROR.title: Media decode error
MEDIA_DECODE_ERROR.message: The media playback was aborted due to a corruption problem or because the media used features your browser did not support.

MEDIA_ABORT_ERROR.title: Playback aborted
MEDIA_ABORT_ERROR.message: The media playback was aborted by the client.

MEDIA_NETWORK_ERROR.title: Media network error
MEDIA_NETWORK_ERROR.message: A network error caused the media download to fail. Please check your internet connection.

MEDIA_UNKNOWN_ERROR.title: Unknown media error
MEDIA_UNKNOWN_ERROR.message: An unknown media error occurred on the HTML player. Please notify an admin about the failing track.

INVALID_PROGRESS.title: Invalid progress value
INVALID_PROGRESS.message: The value given to set the progress is not a number.

INVALID_VOLUME.title: Invalid volume value
INVALID_VOLUME.message: The value given to set the volume is not a number.

INVALID_TRACK_URL.title: Invalid track url
INVALID_TRACK_URL.message: The url given to set the track is not a string, nor an url.

CANT_STRETCH_COLUMN.title: Can't stretch this column
CANT_STRETCH_COLUMN.message: The column you want to stretch is too tight to absorb the overflow. Use Stretch All in the view options to restore the table layout.

ALREADY_STRETCH.title: Layout already stretched
ALREADY_STRETCH.message: Your column layout is already stretched. Resize any column if you want to change the layout.

CANT_CENTER_TRACK.title: Can not center on given track
CANT_CENTER_TRACK.message: The track ID you gave to center the list view on is not valid.

NO_NEXT_TRACK.title: No track to play next
NO_NEXT_TRACK.message: Please select a track or open a playlist to play a track.

INVALID_SHUFFLE_MODE.title: Invalid shuffle mode
INVALID_SHUFFLE_MODE.message: Something went wrong with the shuffle value. Contact an administrator (support@manazeak.org)

TOO_MUCH_TRACK_TO_ADD_TO_QUEUE.title: Too much track to queue
TOO_MUCH_TRACK_TO_ADD_TO_QUEUE.message: You want to add more than 1000 tracks and it is not a reasonable action, either for you and me.

BAD_FORMAT.title: Wrong format
BAD_FORMAT.message: The server didn't understand what you said.

BAD_REQUEST.title: Bad request
BAD_REQUEST.message: The server didn't expect this request.

DB_ERROR.title: Database error
DB_ERROR.message: Something went wrong with the database.

FILE_NOT_FOUND.title: No such file
FILE_NOT_FOUND.message: The server didn't find the file you asked for.

DIR_NOT_FOUND.title: No such directory
DIR_NOT_FOUND.message: The server didn't find the directory you asked for.

EMPTY_LIBRARY.title: The library is empty
EMPTY_LIBRARY.message: There is no file to add in the library

COVER_ERROR.title: Can't create file
COVER_ERROR.message: The server cannot generate the file for the covers, check the permissions.

PERMISSION_ERROR.title: Not permitted
PERMISSION_ERROR.message: You are not allowed to do this.

SCAN_IN_PROGRESS.title: Library isn't ready
SCAN_IN_PROGRESS.message: Another scan is running in the background, please be a little more patient

NO_HISTORY.title: Your history is empty
NO_HISTORY.message: You can't play a previous song if you haven't listened to any!

NO_SAME_ARTIST.title: No results were found
NO_SAME_ARTIST.message: Can't find any track by the same artist

NO_SAME_GENRE.title: No results were found
NO_SAME_GENRE.message: Can't find any track with the same genre

NO_SAME_ALBUM.title: No results were found
NO_SAME_ALBUM.message: Can't find any track with the same album

SYNCTHING_ERROR.title: Failed to communicate with syncthing
SYNCTHING_ERROR.message: Check if syncthing is running correctly

USER_DELETE_ERROR.title: Can't delete this user
USER_DELETE_ERROR.message: You can't delete your own account if you are admin

NO_STATS.title: Can't display stats
NO_STATS.message: Use the application for generating stats

BAD_FILENAME.title: The filename is invalid
BAD_FILENAME.message: Change the filename if you want to upload it

FILE_EXISTS.title: File already exists
FILE_EXISTS.message: The file you want to upload already exists

DND_ERROR.title: The drag and drop hasn't been setup
DND_ERROR.message: The administrator didn't configure the buffer folder correctly

FORMAT_ERROR.title: The format provided doesn't have support

DOWNLOAD_LIMIT.title: Your maximum download limith has been reached
DOWNLOAD_LIMIT.message: Select fewer tracks and try again

DIR_CREATION_ERROR.title: Can't create a folder
DIR_CREATION_ERROR.message: The application can't create a folder, please contact the administrator

NOT_IMPLEMENTED.title: The operation you asked isn't coded yet.
NOT_IMPLEMENTED.message: Please wait for a future update to do this.
